title: NIT Karnataka Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for Junior Research Fellow Posts
description: The National Institute of Technology Karnataka (NIT Karnataka) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 01 Junior Research Fellow Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their M.E./M. Tech in Computer Science, Electronics Engineering, and M.Sc can apply for the NIT Karnataka Recruitment 2025 . The interested applicants can apply in offline mode. Here ...
